snippet: An official at the agency that regulates mortgage fund distributors Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac allegedly threatened to kill its former acting head last week and is now facing felony charges, according to police and court documents....

headline.print_headline: Official at Housing Regulator Threatens Former Boss, Faces Charges
headline.main: Official at Housing Regulator Threatens Former Boss, Faces Charges

lead_paragraph: An official at the agency that regulates mortgage fund distributors Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac allegedly threatened to kill its former acting head last week and is now facing felony charges, according to police and court documents.
